characters: Driver of a white sedan, truck driver
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road. A white sedan is visible on the right side, and a large truck is moving from the left lane into the self-vehicles lane, causing a potential cut-in situation. The trucks movement is abrupt and forces the self-vehicle to decelerate to avoid collision.
actions: The self-driving vehicle decelerates rapidly to avoid a collision with the truck that is cutting into its lane from the left side. The vehicle maintains a safe distance from the truck and adjusts its speed accordingly.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A large truck, approximately 5 meters away, moving abruptly into the self-vehicles lane, causing the vehicle to decelerate. 2) Right side: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, maintaining its lane.
